title: ‘BNP to ensure safety of July fighters if voted to power’
body: BNP Secretary General Mirza Fakhrul Islam Alamgir today said BNP will ensure the security of those who took part in the July-August movement, if the party voted to power. At a discussion meeting held in Dhaka, he said there are concerns among many regarding the safety of the July fighters. "After this interim government, when a new government comes, what arrangements will be there for their security?" "If we come to power through people's votes, we will ensure the security of the July fighters." Fakhrul further said his party would not let the July fighters remain unsafe.
